about_the_game:
A novel game where a rabbit girl and various characters spend time together.

[★Synopsis★]

------
The main character, Kosuke Tamaki, has advanced to his second year of high school.
He finds an injured rabbit while walking in the forest.
When I took him home and let him rest, what was the person standing in front of me the next morning?
-----

Please enjoy the relaxing daily life of the characters.
Play time will be approximately 1 hour.

【★Rest House★】


scenario:Mov Ken
illustration:Kinakousa

[★Voice actor★]


Yukino Suzuka

Furugori

[★Composer of the music used★]

Rabbit shop music room

Sharou

Reo

[★Author of background material used★]


Minchirie

*The characters, organizations, names, etc. that appear are fictitious and have nothing to do with reality.
